name: CoffeeScript
author: Fatih Acet
description: CoffeeScript Class : a Koding course for learning CoffeeScript.

chapters.title: Variable Assignment
chapters.description: Assign your name as a string value to a variable named person.

chapters.title: Define a Function
chapters.description: Define a function named greet that takes no argument and alerts 'Hello CoffeeScript'

chapters.title: Function Arguments
chapters.description: Given the greet function below, change it so that it accepts a single argument and prints out the value inside the alert.
